pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Honey pastry made from jaramel, milk & amaranth. Tastes great! The only thing that would make it more delicious would be the tears of your enemies.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Unlocks when adding a Ghast Tear in the one empty slot of the recipe.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Gives a random effect of three, refreshes then if eaten while still active.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Gives 'Frenzy' status effect. (boosts damage, attack speed, knockback resistance & DR the more the player kills; not killing gives negative effects : Weakness, Slowness, Wither up to instant damage; the higher the level of frenzy, the faster the effects scale)
